title: Login issue- Card Declined
description: User cannot log into the portal after password reset.

title: Payment not processed
description: Customer reports payment stuck at processing state.

title: Email notification error
description: System is not sending confirmation emails.

title: App crash on iOS
description: Mobile app crashes on iOS 17 devices.

title: Report generation delay
description: Analytics reports taking longer than usual to generate.

title: UI alignment issue
description: Dashboard widgets are misaligned in Safari browser.

title: API timeout
description: External API call fails due to timeout errors.

title: Wrong invoice total
description: Invoices are showing incorrect tax calculation.

title: Password reset email not received
description: Customer did not receive password reset email.

title: Feature request - Dark mode
description: Customer requested dark mode support in the dashboard.

title: Slow page load
description: Landing page is loading slowly on 3G networks.

title: Security vulnerability report
description: Customer found a potential XSS vulnerability.
